column5: Hi all,  Got an hour of fishing in before sunset in front of the house on Lake Wabigoon.  After a pretty miserable year where the weather has really messed up the fishing for walleye on "The Goon", it looks like we are actually getting a normal fall bite, and I have been consistently landing 20"+ fish over the last 2 weeks right off the shore at the bottom of our lawn, about time too....lol.   tonight the lake gave up a rare treasure...and I landed a 31.5" walleye just as it was getting dark, my PB! I'm buzzing still...with a huge Cheshire cat grin. In all the excitement, I forgot to put the tourney sign in the pic even though I had it right there!...but I was kinda hurrying to get the fish back to the water to fight again another day...which it did  Vid is kinda long and includes a few smaller fish before thebig guy  at the very end.   MY NEW PB WALLEYE
Awesome eye Simon Congrats
Congrats Simon, she's a beaut!!  Joey
nice eye!!!
nice video Simon.  I wish I could chuck a bait like you and catch that often...  maybe I need to move...  LOL
That is a huge eye. I can't believe you catch all these fish right in front of your house.... oh, the jealousy.  Congratulations on the personal best!
Congrats!  Not many things sweeter than catching fish like that from shore....especially when the shore line is your yard!
Wow what a nice fish! Can't remember but do you ice fish in front of your place? I'd be building a hut if you don't have one yet.
Nice fish Simon! That'll be tough to beat, you might as well give up now!
Fantastic report Simon!!! Thanks!
That's just wrong ... to have a fishery like that in your back yard. (Sitting here in envy of course). Congrats on a beauty of a catch.
nice!
nice fish  bummer about the OFC sign missing
Nice fish man  . Must be nice to go into your yard and pull out something like that
way to go Simon thats a beast of a an eye, nice to be able to catch them right off the lawn mower.

Excellent report, video, and pics Simon!!!  Now that's a Walleye!!!  Don't worry about the tourney sign, I've got a feeling you'll catch an even bigger one!!!  Thanks for taking the time to post that report!
That is one nice walleye.  It sure is nice being able to walk out your door and toss a line.  Boy do I miss it.
Right on brothah!!  What kind of set up you using??  Is that a bullet weight I see there?  Awesome.  HD
Wow ...... from your front yard  ??? Thats awesome.
WOW! What a monster eye. You have some amazing fishing right at your door step. You are very lucky!
Beauty Walter! Congrats! Out my front door...I wont get started.
This eye is a beauty! some nice yard york:)
awesome eye congrats

Great report, pics and video Simon Man look at that beast    Congratulations on your PB  Glad that the bigger ones are moving into your bay..... doesn't get any better than that!!! Keep up the good work and thanks for sharing Jacques
GOLDEN NUGGET!
